name: Disturbing the Dead
description:
Disturbing the Dead will take you on a perilous journey underground. You play as a local adventurer who explores the catacombs and burial grounds beneath an old town. As you intrude this resting place, the skeletons rise to defend their sanctum. Who is the real monster? The reanimated remains, or the proud knight who disturbs their rest?

Unlock abilities to make it to the final guardian and escape the crypt. Challenge yourself to complete the game in the shortest time possible. Disturbing the Dead is the product of three friends (shorty, paulfi, schlaeps) learning Unreal and participating in our first game jam ever: Metroidvania Month.
